Class Volume

  • java.lang.Object
    • Volume

  • public class Volume
extends java.lang.Object
    Class allows for data to be read from disk. Stores SuperBlock, GroupDescriptor and Inodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Volume(java.lang.String name)
      Opens up the disk, reads the superblock, group descriptors and inodes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getByteBuffer(long offset, int length)
      Reads length bytes from volume and returns ByteBuffer
      byte[] getBytes(long offset, int length)
      Reads length bytes from volume and returns byte[]
      GroupDescriptor getGroupDescriptor()
      Gets Group Descriptor
      Inode getInode(int index)
      Gets Inode at specified index from the array
      SuperBlock getSuperBlock()
      Gets Superblock
      java.nio.ByteBuffer wrapBuffer(byte[] bytes)
      Wraps a byte array into a buffer and sets the order to Little Endian

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
